channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden’s Florida legacy: An economic boom, a magnet for immigrants and a solidly conservative red state
item.description: No state has been more affected by the increase in immigrants than Florida, according to internal government data obtained by The Associated Press.
